title: 09/29 BONUS: Mailbag and DFS Advice (Recorded Fri.)
description:
Want to feel better about starting Ben Roethlisberger? We've got a great stat for you Big Ben owners. We also talk about Le'Veon Bell's keeper league value, grade your trades and answer your lineup questions. Then Mike McClure joins the show to give DFS advice (30:50).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
